attributes.action: ALL MP's cheating on expenses be fired from thier jobs and face possible prosecution to the full extent of the law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the media has recently shown how low our mp's will go to obtain taxpayers monies, this however i believe this is only the tip of the iceberg.
I believe all mp's caught falsifying expences should be fired and prosecuted for fraud/theft.
you have something on your mind and walk out of public premises (eg shop or super market) "i will pay for it now" does not work, high percentage of prosecution.
cheat on your expences at work, very high possibility of being sacked/fired, and may face prosecution.

I suggest mp's be paid £100 per overnight stay in london, but only if they are attending parliamemt and only while parliament is open.
No reciept = No expenses paid out, whatever the value including under £250.00.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
